-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | HMatrix interface to LAPACK functions for banded matrices
--   
@package hmatrix-banded
@version 0.0

module Numeric.LinearAlgebra.Banded

-- | Stores an upper triangular band matrix in the form:
--   
--   <pre>
--   a11 a12 a13
--   a22 a23 a24
--   a33 a34 a35
--   a44 a45 a46
--   a55 a56 a57
--   </pre>
newtype UpperMatrix a
UpperMatrix :: (Matrix a) -> UpperMatrix a

-- | Stores the upper half of a symmetric band matrix in the same layout as
--   <a>UpperMatrix</a>.
newtype SymmetricMatrix a
SymmetricMatrix :: (Matrix a) -> SymmetricMatrix a
choleskyDecompose :: C a => SymmetricMatrix a -> UpperMatrix a
class CholeskySolve c
choleskySolve :: (CholeskySolve c, C a) => UpperMatrix a -> c a -> c a
instance (Show a, Element a) => Show (UpperMatrix a)
instance (Show a, Element a) => Show (SymmetricMatrix a)
instance CholeskySolve Matrix
instance CholeskySolve Vector
instance C Double
instance C Float
